columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the specified evidence folder.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The identifier for the folder in which evidence is stored.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) specifying the evidence folder.

columns.name: assessment_id
columns.description: The identifier for the specified assessment.

columns.name: control_set_id
columns.description: The identifier for the control set.

columns.name: assessment_report_selection_count
columns.description: The total count of evidence included in the assessment report.

columns.name: author
columns.description: The name of the user who created the evidence folder.

columns.name: control_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the specified control.

columns.name: data_source
columns.description: The AWS service from which the evidence was collected.

columns.name: date
columns.description: The date when the first evidence was added to the evidence folder.

columns.name: evidence_aws_service_source_count
columns.description: The total number of AWS resources assessed to generate the evidence.

columns.name: evidence_by_type_compliance_check_count
columns.description: The number of evidence that falls under the compliance check category.

columns.name: evidence_by_type_compliance_check_issues_count
columns.description: The total number of issues that were reported directly from AWS Security Hub, AWS Config, or both.

columns.name: evidence_by_type_configuration_data_count
columns.description: The number of evidence that falls under the configuration data category.

columns.name: evidence_by_type_manual_count
columns.description: The number of evidence that falls under the manual category.

columns.name: evidence_by_type_user_activity_count
columns.description: The number of evidence that falls under the user activity category.

columns.name: evidence_resources_included_count
columns.description: The amount of evidence included in the evidence folder.

columns.name: total_evidence
columns.description: The total amount of evidence in the evidence folder.
